{FAMILY GAMES The four most popular family games are: Card games 50%, Monopoly 46%, Dominoes 25%, and Cluedo 23%.
{LEISURE FACILITIES IN BASLOW They include: Women's Institute, Village Choir, Gardening Club, flower arranging, yoga, painting, dancing, drama, youth clubs, Thursday Club.
